comments: Thank you for this content. There aren't many opportunities for Woozi to show his vocal abilities. He really has the best vocal control with wide vocal range in Seventeen and knows how to express his emotions through his voice, that's why he's a vocal leader. Woozi is really cool especially when it comes to music. He deserves the best. It's a shame people are still blind to a hidden ace of kpop, woozi.
